caption: This is an ambient house music piece. There is no singer in the music. There are various resonating synth sounds used with ambient sound effects. Electronic drum hits can be heard reverberating in the piece. The atmosphere is airy. The best use for this piece would be either as an advertisement jingle or as a background music for a tutorial/instructive video.
